meanings.definition: A person who is not white in race or skin color.
meanings.sent1: The school welcomed a new student who was a nonwhite.
meanings.sent2: There are many nonwhites in the community who contribute positively.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone dressed up as superheroes except for John, who went as a nonwhite.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of white swans, the nonwhite duck stood out.
meanings.sent5: The nonwhite family brought delicious dishes to the potluck.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to people who are not white in race or skin color.
meanings.sent1: The nonwhite community center hosted a cultural event.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful nonwhite dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The nonwhite paint on the walls brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: His nonwhite heritage influenced his perspective on diversity.
meanings.sent5: The nonwhite flowers added a pop of color to the garden.
